relatedEntityMappings.description: additional collections provided by the user that get applied to the step output

relatedEntityMappingId.description: Unique identifier of the related entity mapping

expressionContext.description: An element in the source data from which to derive the values of this related entity's properties

uriExpression.description: XPath expression for generating the uri of this related entity instance document

collections.description: additional collections provided by the user that get applied to this related entity instance document

permissions.description: Comma-delimited string of role,capability,role,capability,etc for the entity instance generated by this mapping

targetEntityType.description: The identifier of the related Entity Type. (IRI, with title as fallback)
